children.heading: Deposition of titanium-aluminum carbide (TiAlC); and
children.label: 3B001.d.8.c.1 – Deposition of titanium-aluminum carbide (TiAlC); and

content.html: d.8.c.1. Deposition of titanium-aluminum carbide (TiAlC); and
content.text: d.8.c.1. Deposition of titanium-aluminum carbide (TiAlC); and

children.heading: Enabling a work function greater than 4.0 eV;
children.label: 3B001.d.8.c.2 – Enabling a work function greater than 4.0 eV;

content.html: d.8.c.2. Enabling a work function greater than 4.0 eV;
content.text: d.8.c.2. Enabling a work function greater than 4.0 eV;

content.html:
Technical Note:

For the purposes of 3B001.d.8, 'work function metal' is a material that controls the threshold voltage of a transistor.
content.text: Technical Note: For the purposes of 3B001.d.8, 'work function metal' is a material that controls the threshold voltage of a transistor.
